price: Bityo (yewe Muhamadi), ihanganire itegeko rya Nyagasani wawe, kandi ntube nk’umwe wamizwe n’ifi (Umuhanuzi Yunusu) ubwo yadutakambiraga n’agahinda kenshi.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā takun kaṣāḥibi al-ḥūti idh nādā wahuwa makẓūmun
